title: information security flaws
extract: 1) In computer security, a weakness in automated systems security procedures, administrative controls, Internet controls, etc., that could be exploited by a threat to gain unauthorized access to information or to disrupt critical processing. ... 3) In computer security, any weakness or flaw existing in a system.
extract_html: 1) In computer security, a weakness in automated systems security procedures, administrative controls, Internet controls, etc., that could be exploited by a threat to gain unauthorized access to information or to disrupt critical processing. ... 3) In computer security, any weakness or flaw existing in a system.
